required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Per Effort Study of Inflammation During a 100 Miles

brief_summary.textblock: To study per and post effort variations of inflammatory biological markers during a 100 miles

primary_outcome.measure: Variation per and post effort of interleukin 1 plasma level
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change measures : departure, 25, 49, 72, 100, 126, 144, 164 kilometers (arrival) then at day 1, day 2 and day 7 after the completion of the race
primary_outcome.description: Plasma level of per and post effort of interleukin 1 will be measured

primary_outcome.measure: Variation per and post effort of interleukin 6 plasma level
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change measures : departure, 25, 49, 72, 100, 126, 144, 164 kilometers (arrival) then at day 1, day 2 and day 7 after the completion of the race
primary_outcome.description: Plasma level of per and post effort of interleukin 6 will be measured

primary_outcome.measure: Variation of per and post effort of protein C reactive
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change measures : departure, 25, 49, 72, 100, 126, 144, 164 kilometers (arrival) then at day 1, day 2 and day 7 after the completion of the race
primary_outcome.description: Plasma level of per and post effort of protein C reactive will be measured

primary_outcome.measure: Variation per and post effort of interleukin Tumor Necrosis Factor alpha
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change measures : departure, 25, 49, 72, 100, 126, 144, 164 kilometers (arrival) then at day 1, day 2 and day 7 after the completion of the race
primary_outcome.description: Plasma level of per and post effort of tumor necrosis alpha will be measured

primary_outcome.measure: Variation per and post effort of interleukin 4 plasma level
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change measures : departure, 25, 49, 72, 100, 126, 144, 164 kilometers (arrival) then at day 1, day 2 and day 7 after the completion of the race
primary_outcome.description: Plasma level of per and post effort of interleukin 4 will be measured

primary_outcome.measure: Variation per and post effort of interleukin 10 plasma level
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change measures : departure, 25, 49, 72, 100, 126, 144, 164 kilometers (arrival) then at day 1, day 2 and day 7 after the completion of the race
primary_outcome.description: Plasma level of per and post effort of interleukin 10 will be measured

primary_outcome.measure: Variation per and post effort of interleukin 13 plasma level
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change measures : departure, 25, 49, 72, 100, 126, 144, 164 kilometers (arrival) then at day 1, day 2 and day 7 after the completion of the race
primary_outcome.description: Plasma level of per and post effort of interleukin 13 will be measured

primary_outcome.measure: Variation per and post effort of interleukin tumor growth factor beta plasma level
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change measures : departure, 25, 49, 72, 100, 126, 144, 164 kilometers (arrival) then at day 1, day 2 and day 7 after the completion of the race
primary_outcome.description: Plasma level of per and post effort of tumor growth factor beta

primary_outcome.measure: Variation per and post effort of lipids plasma level
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change measures : departure, 25, 49, 72, 100, 126, 144, 164 kilometers (arrival) then at day 1, day 2 and day 7 after the completion of the race
primary_outcome.description: Plasma level of per and post effort of lipids

primary_outcome.measure: Variation per and post effort of lipoproteins plasma level
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change measures : departure, 25, 49, 72, 100, 126, 144, 164 kilometers (arrival) then at day 1, day 2 and day 7 after the completion of the race
primary_outcome.description: Plasma level of per and post effort of lipoproteins

intervention.description: Blood sample to study per and post effort evolution markers of systemic inflammation

biospec_descr.textblock: pro and anti inflammatory biomarkers (reactive oxygen species)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- adults (age>18years)
- completion of an ultra endurance race (50 miles) during the 2 years before
Exclusion Criteria:
- female
- age<18years
